Title: Air Superiority
Description:
<As Ignax looks up, you see a small smile appear on his face.>

Few of my soldiers have experience fighting alongside dragons. What a glorious day.

Their presence gives us confidence, $c. Now we must put an end to the djaradin's advance once and for all.
ObjectivesText: Defeat the djaradin forces and stop their advance in the Battlefield Ruins.
